com.sb.elsinore

Class Pump

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sb.elsinore.Pump

  • public class Pump
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class for pump control. not very complex. Designed to control a single GPIO pin with a straight forward on/off functionality
    Author:
    Doug Edey
